alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 11:12AM PST until December 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Snowfall accumulations between 4 to 8 inches are expected. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Friday. The heaviest snow is expected on Friday afternoon between 10 AM and 4 PM. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Check WSDOT for the latest conditions and travel information over Stevens Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
